direct_answer.text:
To find out how many hours John spends taking care of dogs each week, we need to calculate the total number of hours he spends in a week. John works every day of the week, so we can simply multiply the number of hours per day by 7 to get the total number of hours per week. The answer is: 948838 hours per week. That's a lot of time spent walking dogs!
